owner_summaries.key_concerns: High number of reconciliation exceptions and flux analysis issues
Accruals and intercompany mismatches require further review

residual_risks.description: Unbalanced trial balances at the entity level could lead to material misstatements in financial reporting.
residual_risks.mitigation_recommendations: Implement automated checks to ensure trial balances are zeroed out before close.

residual_risks.description: High number of flux analysis exceptions indicates potential anomalies in account movements.
residual_risks.mitigation_recommendations: Enhance flux analysis thresholds and investigate recurring exceptions.

residual_risks.description: Reconciliation exceptions in AP, AR, and bank accounts increase the risk of undetected errors or fraud.
residual_risks.mitigation_recommendations: Strengthen reconciliation processes and reduce exception thresholds.

residual_risks.description: Open HITL cases may delay critical financial close activities.
residual_risks.mitigation_recommendations: Prioritize resolution of open HITL cases before close deadlines.
